RM8J01
Mario Party8

Please push either of the button before loading the savingdata.

No1 ("1"button) [ZiT]
2820D2A2 00000200
04003200 2C1D0000
04003220 2C1D0000
04003240 2C1D0000
E0000000 80008000

No2 ("2"button) [ZiT]
2820D2A2 00000100
04003200 2C1D0001
04003220 2C1D0001
04003240 2C1D0001
E0000000 80008000

No3 ("up"button) [ZiT]
2820D2A2 00000008
04003200 2C1D0002
04003220 2C1D0002
04003240 2C1D0002
E0000000 80008000

No4 ("down"button) [ZiT]
2820D2A2 00000004
04003200 2C1D0003
04003220 2C1D0003
04003240 2C1D0003
E0000000 80008000

0400321C 48042390
